title: The Knoxville Comedy Special W DCYoungFly, Karlous Miller & Chico Bean | Ep. 194
itunes:title: The Knoxville Comedy Special W DCYoungFly, Karlous Miller & Chico Bean | Ep. 194
description:
The coldest comedy crew in the land stopped through Knoxville Tennessee to bring the real laughs! You know they gotta roast the whole city. From the African Man with the white lady to the entire bridal party, nobody is safe. Plus the ghetto chick who stood up turned the whole show upside down! The crew brings back 92 Am rebel radio and this time they include an audience member "Timbo-Ray" and with the band backing up the crew, DC Young Fly, Karlous Miller and Chico Bean bring the musical improv. GET TICKETS TO THE LATE SHOW THIS WEEKEND! FOXWOODS CASINO Mashantucket, CT - https://webtixs.foxwoods.com/Entertai... BOSTON WILBUR THEATER https://www1.ticketmaster.com/85-sout... FOLLOW THE CREW KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/ DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/ CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/ BILLY SORRELLS - https://www.facebook.com/billysorrells/ FAT AND PAID - https://www.facebook.com/Fatandpaid/ DARREN BRAND - https://www.facebook.com/darrenbigbab... CLAYTON ENGLISH - http://www.claytonenglish.com/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
